content.html: CAB process be like jumping over a pavement crack... * Measure the distance with a tape measure * Write down exactly how you're going to jump * Research (at length) jumping methodologies * Call a friend and discuss your jump technique Jump! ... then still land on the crack 🙃
content.value:
CAB process be like jumping over a pavement crack...

* Measure the distance with a tape measure
* Write down exactly how you're going to jump
* Research (at length) jumping methodologies
* Call a friend and discuss your jump technique

Jump! ... then still land on the crack 🙃
